Class Library

java.lang.Object
Library
public class Library extends Object
The Library class represents a collection of books in a library. It allows for adding books, finding books, borrowing, and returning books.

  • Constructor Details

    • Library

      public Library()
      Default constructor for the Library class. It initializes the catalog with a fixed size of 20 books.

  • Method Details

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a string representation of the library catalog. It includes a list of all books in the library or a message if the catalog is empty.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      A string representing the library catalog.

    • alreadyExists

      public boolean alreadyExists(Book book)
      Checks if a given book already exists in the catalog.
      Parameters:
      book - The Book object to check for existence.
      Returns:
      true if the book exists, false otherwise.

    • addBook

      public boolean addBook(Book book)
      Adds a book to the catalog if it doesn't already exist.
      Parameters:
      book - The Book object to be added to the catalog.
      Returns:
      true if the book was added successfully, false otherwise.

    • findBook

      public Book findBook(int bookCode)
      Finds a book in the catalog by its book code.
      Parameters:
      bookCode - The code of the book to find.
      Returns:
      The Book object if found, null otherwise.

    • borrowBook

      public boolean borrowBook(int bookCode, int quantity)
      Borrows a book from the library if it is available and borrowable.
      Parameters:
      bookCode - The code of the book to borrow.
      quantity - The quantity of books to borrow.
      Returns:
      true if the book was borrowed successfully, false otherwise.

    • returnBook

      public boolean returnBook(int bookCode, int quantity)
      Returns a book to the library, updating the quantity in stock.
      Parameters:
      bookCode - The code of the book to return.
      quantity - The quantity of books to return.
      Returns:
      true if the book was returned successfully, false otherwise.
